channel.title: A good PK server
channel.description:
I been thinking of creating something from the RSCangel base.
Would like to know what people want I havce a few ideas myself like: Making it slighty RS2 souch as:
Making the prayer/maging menu like Stats menu - don't know what I mean? tell me and I post a picture styling the in-game with more pictures
Thats more client side actions.
Server side delete skills ? yes or no ; clan system pk points exchange pk points re-birth new items new color such as RunePlate (gold) new world new wilderness etc, etc.
Theres so much you can do in-game as well but does it matter? RSC don't need to die, we been fine with having 100 people playing 1 server and it seemed worth buying a Dedicated server to keep the spart alive!
~Uberpk3r

item.title: A good PK server
item.dc:creator: @Ecko Ecko
item.description:
@Ecko wrote:

[quote=“uberpk3r, post:28, topic:374192”][quote author=Crooks link=topic=470181.msg3440601#msg3440601 date=1293063039]
Alright, thats up to you guys.
But you all should know, that ive never been involved in any infections or any other idiotic things, Im not like that.
I dont want to blame mario, but thats true…

Well, i guess its all up to you where and what you want to play…
Nothing i can do about it, only hope that someday you guys get the respect back to me.

Thanks.
[/quote]

Lawl why bother its a kiddies game, you run a server for 50 people who are 20-40 year old, you would think you would get any appreciation from weed smoking 25 year old dude. but no they cry just as much as 12 year old kids from RS2 that can’t find the right section to advertise on.

You can’t run a RuneScape Classic server for money.
You hardly will be liked for your server = proof xEnt, lawl.
You wont gain respect, only flame and shit on the advertise.

Whats left ? you own satisfaction?
Pathetic if you ask me and I know deep inside of you you thinking the same.

RSCemulation has worst rumors theres been plenty of flames shit talk about that game.
Last stand is purely one week fun server
rscaftermatch well pomp is a walking wallet, no more has to be said about that, he spammed me for help on hes first server btw.

anyway i don’t give a fuck I infected people because you all bunch of idiots and its not worth my time nor anyone else time.

Theres less then 5 people who always been true and loyal to me.

Crooks is one of them, I never meet him IRL but still I’m closes to him then many others.[/quote]
You done gobbling his penis?

Read full topic

item.title: A good PK server
item.dc:creator: @uberpk3r uberpk3r
item.description:
@uberpk3r wrote:

[quote=“DMXXXX, post:13, topic:374192”][quote author=nacional link=topic=470181.msg3438864#msg3438864 date=1292965355]
yeah, I rather play that than a server with an admin who ran his server for donations and reportedly
put a virus in his client.
[/quote]
He put a keylogger in his client and he fucked himself over by telling Pat.[/quote]

There you see how little you know. You assume quite abit yet still your talking nonsense.

I fucked my self by telling patrick? what does that even mean?
I told patrick because I’m nice.

The keylogger was not put in the client.
It was a simple rat, I infected him with a keylogger after long time before he started with stealing my s tork source.
only reason why I keylogged him is because he hacked my cps and stole my source.

And people still shitting about I stole donations? I never used it for myself I bought a staminus server for 600 usd 50 of them where from my own pocket so please stfu about that.

I lost my interest about Keylogging/rat and shit long time ago, but there was one reason to keep the rat online, it was because patrick was there and he stole my source. there for I was going to let him host my server for a while before I fuckt him over.

I did him a favor by telling him he was keylogged, I lost thwe interest for keylogging and ratting , was to much work.

Read full topic

item.title: A good PK server
item.dc:creator: @OldSkoolRSC OldSkoolRSC
item.description:
@OldSkoolRSC wrote:

uberpk3r:

Making it slighty RS2 souch as:

Yeah thats how u keep RSC from dieing…bring rs2 shit into it. i like ur logic.

if u want to make a good pking server. keep it simple. focus entirely on pvp. do NOT encourage skilling. Fast xp rates, good drop rates or an entirely new take on a system that gives items value and therefore a lasting economy. Make it so ur players play to pk, nothing else. Get people known in the scene on ur crew to be taken seriously…no im not talking about what 3hit did. As long as players spend more time pking on ur pking server then training and farming, you will attract players.

Tip…do not go points system. People form bonds with pkers they have trained, even if that training was short.

Read full topic

kk, I now see what you mean, and you didn’t see what I meant at first :P.

That’s the difference between and the other servers who ask for donations.
